tagline: India's leading food delivery, dining, and restaurant discovery platform.
description: Zomato helps users discover restaurants, order food online, and explore dining experiences across India.

faq.a: Zomato is a food delivery and restaurant discovery platform that helps users order food, explore restaurants, and check reviews.
You can search for restaurants, browse menus, place online food orders, track delivery, or make dining reservations through the app.
Yes. Zomato Gold is a membership that offers benefits like priority delivery, exclusive discounts, and special dining offers.
Delivery charges vary depending on distance, demand, restaurant location, and order value.
Zomato may charge a platform fee and delivery fee depending on location and demand conditions.
Zomato is for anyone who wants to order food online, explore restaurants, read honest reviews, or make dining reservations.

faq.q: Do restaurants need to pay to be listed?
faq.a: Basic restaurant listings are free, but partners can opt for promotional plans to reach more customers.
Restaurants can partner with Zomato through the Zomato Partner Portal and complete onboarding online.
